name: TYPFontAwesome
summary: The iconic font designed for Bootstrap. Contains only the official font files directly from Font Awesome.
description: Include TYPFontAwesome/OTF, TYPFontAwesome/EOT, TYPFontAwesome/TTF, etc in your podfile to add specific Font Awesome fonts to your project. The version of this CocoaPod will always match a version of Font Awesome.
